fr.zcraft.quartzlib.components.i18n.translators

Class Translator

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.zcraft.quartzlib.components.i18n.translators.Translator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GettextPOTranslator, PropertiesTranslator, YAMLTranslator

    public abstract class Translator
extends Object
    Classes used to load & store the translations extends this class.

    Translators are lazy: strings are only loaded on first use.

    • Field Detail

      • NO_CONTEXT_KEY

        protected static final String NO_CONTEXT_KEY
        We need a string without meaning to use as the no-context key below. A null value cannot be used because ConcurrentHashMaps does not accept null keys. An empty value cannot be used because an empty context is not the same as no context, and some applications may use them.

      • locale

        protected final Locale locale

      • file

        protected final File file

      • resourceReference

        protected final String resourceReference

      • translations

        protected final Map<String,Map<String,Translation>> translations
        Context → messageId → translation.

        resourceReference - The reference of the resource to load.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Translator getInstance(Locale locale,
                                     File file)
        Returns a new translations loader for this locale and this file.
        Parameters:
        locale - The locale
        file - The file
        Returns:
        A translations loader for this file.

      • getInstance

        public static Translator getInstance(Locale locale,
                                     String resourceReference)
        Returns a new translations loader for this locale and a resource from the plugin's JAR.
        Parameters:
        locale - The locale
        resourceReference - The path to the resource.
        Returns:
        A translations loader for this file.

      • getReader

        protected Reader getReader()

      • getFilePath

        public String getFilePath()
        Gets the path of the underlying file.
        Returns:
        the path of the underlying file.

      • load

        protected abstract void load()
        Loads the translations into the translations map. Translators are lazy: this method will automatically be called on first translation request.

      • translate

        public String translate(String context,
                        String messageId,
                        String messageIdPlural,
                        Integer count)
        Translates a string into the given locale.
        Parameters:
        context - The translation context. null if no context defined.
        messageId - The string to translate.
        messageIdPlural - The plural version of the string to translate. null if this translation does not have a plural form.
        count - The count of items to use to choose the singular or plural form. null if this translation does not have a plural form.
        Returns:
        The translated sentence. null if the sentence is not translated into this locale.

      • getPluralIndex

        public Integer getPluralIndex(Integer count)
        Returns the plural index to use for the given integer.

        Translators should override this to use custom plural rules loaded from the files, if available.
        The default implementation ignores the plural and always returns 0.

        Parameters:
        count - The count.
        Returns:
        The translation index to use for this count.

      • getLastTranslator

        public abstract String getLastTranslator()
        Gets the last translator.
        Returns:
        The last translator.

      • getTranslationTeam

        public abstract String getTranslationTeam()
        Gets the name of the translation team.
        Returns:
        The name of the translation team.

      • getReportErrorsTo

        public abstract String getReportErrorsTo()
        Gets the person to contact if there is an error in the translations.
        Returns:
        The person to contact if there is an error in the translations.

      • getLocale

        public Locale getLocale()
        Gets the locale loaded by this loader.
        Returns:
        The Locale loaded by this loader.

      • getPriority

        public int getPriority()
        Gets the priority of this translator.
        Returns:
        The priority of this translator: higher priority translators will called first for a translation in the translators chain.

      • setPriority

        public void setPriority(int priority)
        Sets the priority of this translator. Higher priority translators will be called first for a translation in the translators chain.
        Parameters:
        priority - The priority. Default to 0 if unset.

      • registerTranslation

        protected void registerTranslation(Translation translation)
        Registers a translation to be stored in the system.
        Parameters:
        translation - The translation to store.

      • getContextKey

        protected String getContextKey(String context)
        Returns the key to use in the translation map for the given context. Must be consistent: multiple calls with the same context must return the same value.

        The default implementation returns the context, or a randomly generated no-context key if the context is null.

        Parameters:
        context - The context. May be null.
        Returns:
        The key to use. Cannot be null.
